it.polimi.se2018.model.table

Class RoundTrack

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.se2018.model.table.RoundTrack

  • public class RoundTrack
extends java.lang.Object
    Class for the round track, keeps track of the current turn The turns are represented in a 10x2*nPlayers matrix containig the IDs of the players in the correct order
    Author:
    Pietro Ghiglio

      • turnNumber

        public int turnNumber(int playerID)
        Parameters:
        playerID - the player's id
        Returns:
        0 if the playerID it's not the current, 1 if it's the player's first turn in the round, 2 if it's the player's second turn if the round.
